metadata.title: CVE-2023-29407 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A maliciously-crafted image can cause excessive CPU consumption indecoding. A tiled image with a height of 0 and a very large width can causeexcessive CPU consumption, despite the image size (width * height)appearing to be zero.

criterions.comment: golang-golang-x-image: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
